titleStmt.title: An ordinance by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament; for the preservation of the vvesterne parts of the Kingdome. John Brown Cleric. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Ohen and G. Dexter, for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shop in Popeshead Alley,

notesStmt.note: Directions for reimbursing those who contributed money, plate, or horses for the Parliamentary army.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
